java/liquibase/exception/MigrationFailedException.java

00001 package liquibase.exception;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.ChangeSet;
00004 
00005 public class MigrationFailedException extends LiquibaseException {
00006 
00007     private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
00008     private ChangeSet failedChangeSet;
00009     
00010     public MigrationFailedException() {
00011     }
00012 
00013     public MigrationFailedException(ChangeSet failedChangeSet, String message) {
00014         super(message);
00015         this.failedChangeSet = failedChangeSet;
00016     }
00017 
00018 
00019     public MigrationFailedException(ChangeSet failedChangeSet, String message, Throwable cause) {
00020         super(message, cause);
00021         this.failedChangeSet = failedChangeSet;
00022     }
00023 
00024     public MigrationFailedException(ChangeSet failedChangeSet, Throwable cause) {
00025         super(cause);
00026         this.failedChangeSet = failedChangeSet;
00027     }
00028 
00029 
00030     public String getMessage() {
00031         String message = "Migration failed";
00032         if (failedChangeSet != null) {
00033             message += " for change set "+failedChangeSet.toString(false);
00034         }
00035         message += ":\n     Reason: "+super.getMessage();
00036         Throwable cause = this.getCause();
00037         while (cause != null) {
00038             message += ":\n          Caused By: "+cause.getMessage();            
00039             cause = cause.getCause();
00040         }
00041 
00042         return message;
00043     }
00044 }
